import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const AddContact = () => { let [state, setState] = useState({ loading: false, contact: { name: "", photo: "", contact: "", email: "", title: "", company: "", groupId: "", }, group: [], errorMessage: "" }) const updateInput = (event) => { setState({ ...state, contact: { ...state.contact, [event.target.name]: event.target.value } }) } let{loading, contact, group, errorMessage}=state return (
